name: Gladio
description: Gladio is a small, experimental game attempting to innovate first person melee combat systems.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows Vista or later (64 bit) Processor: Intel Core i3 (or equivalent) Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 950 (or comparable AMD) Storage: 1370 MB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows Vista or later (64 bit) Processor: Intel Core i5 (or equivalent) Memory: 8 GB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 970 (or comparable AMD) Storage: 1370 MB available space
